title_localized.en: Does Apple Core Hotels charge a deposit for incidentals?

faq_content_localized.en:
Yes, you can pay in advance with the below instructions.

Business travelers coming to Apple Core Hotels may use a company credit card, however, our hotels will only recognize company cards on which your name and the company's name are present and visible.

Please find below each hotel's Advance Pay and 3rd party credit card authorization form to fill out prior to arrival:

  • The Hotel @ Times Square (pdf)
  • Broadway @ Times Square Hotel (pdf)
  • The Hotel @ Fifth Avenue (pdf)
  • The Hotel @ New York City (pdf)
